Package edu.usc.bg

Class Summary
BGMainClass  
Distribution  
FunctionCommandLine A simple command line client to a database, used for testing implemented functionalities for each data store
KillThread The thread is used in rating mode and is responsible for killing the BG client It kills the BG client upon receiving a message from the coordinator reflecting that the BG client is doing poor.
Member Keeps a track of the members in the social network, their unique memberid, the shard they belong to and their index in the shard
MonitoringThread Responsible for monitoring the behavior of a BG client and reporting its statistics to the coordinator once every s seconds the s seconds is decided by the coordinator in the rating mode
PoissonDistribution  
RandomDistribution  
Request  
Server  
Times  
UniformDistribution  
Worker
